name: PRERANA VIKAS SOCIETY
briefDescription: •	To empower the women by promoting strategies and skills through which the livelihoods of poor families and the rights of women children are secured.•	Self Help Group (SHG) and Joint Liability Groups (JLG) promotion•	To uplift the rural and tribal by promoting the people’s awareness to understand the root cause for their poverty and downtrodden and proper action to overcome it.•	Fostering a process of ongoing change for the poor in a way in which this process can be sustained by them.•	Creating opportunities of gainful Self employment, environment and improved quality of lift and respect for human dignity and fostering good human values.•	Rural development and agriculture based industries, increasing awareness of health and education
